name: Dragons of Fire and Ice (Chijkem)
description:
This is our entry for the 2021 GMTK. Spin around as you fight hordes of zombies!

Your enemies are zombies!  Use the fire and ice attacks to do combos. Make sure your stamina stays up or else you'll deplete your health. Regain stamina by staying still (Rest well!). Good luck dragons!

MESSAGE FROM US:

Thank you sincerely for playing our first game. We loved making it, and it would be amazing if you'd leave us a comment on what to improve on!
